game.name: PropHunter
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Sports, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PropHunter - a fresh representative of the genre of hide and seek on the net! The players are divided into two teams - one team is hiding by taking the form and properties of objects, the second team is seek to find for impostors among props. The team that eliminates its rivals wins!
game.shortDescriptionEn: PropHunter - a fresh representative of the genre of hide and seek on the net! The players are divided into two teams - one team is hiding by taking the form and properties of objects, the second team is seek to find for impostors among props. The team that eliminates its rivals wins!

reviewHighlights.text: It can be a fun game actually, the concept is cool, lots of levels and props to swap into but it has a major downside. The private "password only" lob...
Early access for 3 years. I dont know... other than that the game is balanced and it is defintelly fun to play.
